creator: phil.weighill-smith@volantis.com
text:
It would be good if the token replacement filter reader could leverage 
properties, property sets and filter sets (the latter two via ID references) 
as parameters. The only slight issue I can see is that the property set's 
dynamic setting is compromised as the properties from the property set must be 
obtained during the one-off initialization of the filter reader from the 
parameters given.
